Package com.jingle.business

Class UserBusinessService

java.lang.Object
com.jingle.business.UserBusinessService
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserBusinessInterface
@Service
public class UserBusinessService
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserBusinessInterface
Author:
Henry Harvey The UserBusinessService handles the business logic of the application involving users

    • registerUser

      public int registerUser​(User user)
      Take in a user. Create credentials for user with credentialsDataService. If not created, return -1. Return the userDataService create method using user.
      Specified by:
      registerUser in interface UserBusinessInterface
      Parameters:
      user - user to register
      Returns:
      int result

    • loginUser

      public User loginUser​(User user)
      Take in a user. Select credentials for user with credentialsDataService. If not selected, return null. Set user's credentials. Return the userDataService readByCredentialsId method using user.
      Specified by:
      loginUser in interface UserBusinessInterface
      Parameters:
      user - user to login
      Returns:
      int result

    • getUser

      public User getUser​(User user)
      Take in a user. Set user equal to the userDataService read method using user. Set user's credentials equal to the credentialsDataService read method using the user's credentials_id.
      Specified by:
      getUser in interface UserBusinessInterface
      Parameters:
      user - user to get
      Returns:
      User result

    • getAllUsers

      public java.util.List<User> getAllUsers()
      Select all users with userDataService readAll. For each user, set its credentials with credentialsDataService read. Return all users.
      Specified by:
      getAllUsers in interface UserBusinessInterface
      Returns:
      List list of all users

    • editUser

      public int editUser​(User user)
      Take in a user. Update credentials for user with credentialsDataService. If not updated, return 0. Return the userDataService update method using user.
      Specified by:
      editUser in interface UserBusinessInterface
      Parameters:
      user - user to update
      Returns:
      int result

    • removeUser

      public int removeUser​(User user)
      Take in a user. Delete credentials for user with credentialsDataService. If not deleted, return 0. Return the userDataService delete method using user.
      Specified by:
      removeUser in interface UserBusinessInterface
      Parameters:
      user - user to update
      Returns:
      int result
